entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: caching #43078
  • Extracting and setting values in Middleware vs Filter #43074
    Discussions
  • Allow HttpMethodAttribute (HttpGet, HttpPost, etc) to apply to class #43071
  • Blazor Hosted WASM app cannot be published as runtime-dependent if not self-contained from dotnet CLI #43068
  • [Blazor] Handle _GlobalPropertiesToRemoveFromProjectReferences in the SDK #43067
    7.0-rc1
  • Blazor Auth: Replace history entry on navigating to IdP login/register endpoints to avoid navigation cycle #43063
    7.0-rc2
  • HTTP/3: Report address in use when multiple HTTP/3 listeners in the same process #43061
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Adding UseHttpsRedirection conditionally via UseWhen fails in ASP.NET Core 6 #42959
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #43009
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #43016
  • Perf regression: https #43040
  • Count how many blazor - signalR connections are currently opened #43044
    Discussions
  • Evaluate Migrating Deleted NPM/Jest Web.JS Tests to Selenium E2E Test Suite #39793
    Backlog
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularFetchData_ScreenReader: NVDA is not announcing as column headers when focus lands on the column header. #42505
    7.0-rc1
  • Publish BLAZOR WASM with native File Reference SQLite failled #39528
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Hot Reload Stopped Working Blazor WASM #43035
  • Create 6.0 BlazorWebAssemblyApp project with the command and run the "dotnet publish" command, for the first time meet error:'MSB4018: The "GetFileHash" task failed unexpectedly'. #40328
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Specifying bind source for blazor bindings #43073
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorWasmHome_UseOfColor:Only underline used to differentiate the link for "Brief Survey" from normal text. #42437
    7.0-rc1
  • JwtBearerHandler logs are uninformative #43066
  • Quarantine GET_MultipleRequests_RequestVersionOrHigher_UpgradeToHttp3 #43069
  • Packing a Razor Class Library with `--no-build` produces bad output #43062
  • OpenIdConnect Nonce and Correlation cookies cause "Nginx Request Header Or Cookie Too Large" over http #43041
  • Remove `.Any` lambda per call allocation from `DefaultProblemDetailsWriter` #43046
    7.0-rc2
  • Nullable `struct` not working with `AsParameter` #42210
    7.0-rc1
  • Worker service template should include use of IHostApplicationLifetime #40941
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly.PolicyHttpMessageHandler - missing ConfigureAwait(false) in version 6.0.7 #42883
    6.0.9
  • So, how do we manage Sessions in ASP.NET Core in 2021? #33686
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Custom Request-Id for client side requests #38850
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Follow-up for cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #43079
    area-blazor
  • Updating HttpMethodMetadata based on ICorsMetadata #43077
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add FileDownloader service for Blazor apps #43076
    area-blazor, 7.0-rc1
  • HTTP/3: Fix accepting simultaneous connections #43065
    area-runtime
  • Updated jquery dependency to v3.6.0 #43060
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Default to 3 local retries #40503
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Cleanup AspNetCoreAnalyzers #42757
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • [dotnet user-jwts] Move signing key details to top-level property #42674
    area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts, 7.0-rc1
  • Remove call to .Any() from ProblemDetailsDefaultWriter #43055
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Disallowing `nullable` with `AsParameters` attribute #42812
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • HTTP/3: QUIC address in use #42983
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `96f5142` to `dd7a9d2` #43020
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `96f5142` to `dd7a9d2` #43021
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • HTTP/3: Fix per-request context allocation, QuicStream.DisposeAsync #43011
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `74e05a1` to `0c5a96b` #43022
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Fix `GET_MultipleRequests_RequestVersionOrHigher_UpgradeToHttp3()` #43048
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Update branding to 3.1.29 #43050
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/6.0] Set WebApplication.New().ServerFeatures #43001
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Add missing ConfigureAwait(false) to PolicyHttpMessageHandler #42940
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.9
  • Update branding to 6.0.9 #43057
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x

Updated

  • Introduce per-HealthCheck Delay and Periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
  • Remove RequestDelegateFactory call from RouteEndpointBuilder #42827
    area-runtime
  • Cleanup Mvc Analyzers #42754
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add missing "Blazor" project type tag for empty Blazor project templates #43045
    area-mvc
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [Blazor] Dynamic authentication requests #42692
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm-auth
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • test install-scripts #40061
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • RateLimitingMiddleware updates #43053
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #43028
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove IsAvailable check on CommitAsync. #43059
    area-runtime
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
